name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
	t1.`BRANCH`,
	t1.`DELETED`,
	t1.`GRADE`,
	t1.`ID`,
	CONCAT(
		'/',
	CASE
			
			WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN
			(
			SELECT
				GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '/' ) 
			FROM
				zt_module tt 
			WHERE
				tt.type = 'story' 
				AND FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t1.path ) 
			) ELSE t1.`name` 
		END 
		) AS `NAME`,
		(
			CONCAT_ws(
				'',
			CASE
					
					WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN
					(
					SELECT
						GROUP_CONCAT( tt.`ORDER` SEPARATOR '-' ) 
					FROM
						zt_module tt 
					WHERE
						tt.type = 'story' 
					AND FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t1.path )) ELSE t1.`ORDER` 
				END 
				)) AS ORDERPK,
			t1.`ORDER`,
			t1.`OWNER`,
		CASE
				
				WHEN t1.`PARENT` = 0 THEN
				NULL ELSE t1.parent 
			END AS parent,
			t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`,
			t1.`PATH`,
			t1.`ROOT`,
			t1.`SHORT`,
			t1.`TYPE` ,
			t1.MODULESN
		FROM
			`zt_module` t1
			LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.PARENT = t11.ID
